dimensions.label: Communication Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin communicate with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will communicate clearly and straightforwardly, stating opinions without hesitation or sugar-coating.
Your FarTwin will communicate tactfully and considerately, carefully choosing words to maintain harmony.

dimensions.label: Financial Outlook
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin view financial growth?

options.description: Your FarTwin will expect steady and consistent growth, always looking for new opportunities.
Your FarTwin will approach financial growth with a cautious mindset, weighing risks before making decisions.

dimensions.label: Collaboration Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin work with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will fiercely compete to achieve their goals, often at the expense of others.
Your FarTwin will work closely with others, prioritizing teamwork and mutual support.

dimensions.label: Analytical Approach
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach problem-solving?

options.description: Your FarTwin will rely on objective data and evidence to inform their decisions.
Your FarTwin will trust their instincts and experience, often relying on instinct over analysis.

dimensions.label: Technological Comfort
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin interact with technology?

options.description: Your FarTwin is highly comfortable using technology to streamline their workflow and stay connected.
Your FarTwin approaches technology with skepticism, preferring traditional methods whenever possible.

dimensions.label: Social Connection Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin engage with their social circle?

options.description: Your FarTwin will actively seek out social connections and opportunities to expand their network.
Your FarTwin prefers smaller, more intimate social circles, often feeling drained by large groups.

dimensions.label: Creative Approach
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach creativity?

options.description: Your FarTwin is always looking for new and innovative ways to solve problems or express themselves.
Your FarTwin will stick to tried-and-true methods, often preferring proven approaches over experimentation.

dimensions.label: Knowledge Acquisition Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin acquire new knowledge?

options.description: Your FarTwin is always seeking out new information and experiences, staying curious and open-minded.
Your FarTwin will only invest time in learning if it's relevant to their goals or interests.
